metadata.title: CVE-2021-28302 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A stack overflow in pupnp before version 1.14.5 can cause the denial ofservice through the Parser_parseDocument() function. ixmlNode_free() willrelease a child node recursively, which will consume stack space and leadto a crash.

criterions.comment: libupnp: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
mediatomb: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
